name: Hitline
description:
HITLINE

A game made for the Indie Tales Jam!

Inspired in the Hotline Miami and Hitman series, Hitline is a top-down stealth shooter in a single floor-layout building.

As a contract killer working for the HITLINE organization, you're tasked with taking care of the mafia leader Ilbonzo, who resides in that one mysterious building. You know which one. When you enter, however, you realize that not only is it full of guards - great, more work to do -, but every floor has the exact same layout!

Just remember, don't run and shoot, you might just miss your target...

Controls

WASD: Move

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

R Key: Restart floor (only when dead)

3rd party assets

SFX: Chiptone

Music: Chippy's Chiptune Music Pack

Some known bugs (post game jam update will fix these problems)
  • Speedrun timer doesn't work (fixed)
  • When finishing the game and going back to the menu, the buttons don't work (fixed)
  • Aim gets offset when the player hits a wall (fixed)
